title: [Large-Scale] Microlearning Course for Soft Skills Enhancement in Mathematical Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of advanced specialized knowledge in mathematics
context.additional_context: Soft skills training program for in-service mathematics professionals to enhance workplace efficiency.

learning_goals: Learners can apply three or more effective communication strategies during team project execution.
Learners can develop solutions to practical problems by utilizing negotiation skills in conflict situations.
Learners can systematically prioritize tasks when performing mathematics assignments using time management tools.
Learners can propose improvements to problem-solving approaches based on peer evaluation feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
